metadata.Title: CVE-2021-21181 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Side-channel information leakage in autofill in Google Chrome prior to89.0.4389.72 allowed a remote attacker to obtain potentially sensitiveinformation from process memory via a crafted HTML page.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
